section.name: CEA Implementation in Astrogrid
section.p: The Astrogrid projects that implement parts of this architecture are

ul.li: CEA FrameWork This implements the core CEA functionality. There is an overview diagram of the implementation architecture.
Workflow objects which contains the schema and wsdl definitions
Job Management System This does not strictly implement part of the CEA, but does act as the component that invokes the CEA within AstroGrid

section.p: An instance of a server that implements the main CEA interface CommonExecutionConnector of is know as an Execution Controller

ul.li: The Command Line Execution Controller. This is a controller that can act as an adapter to run legacy command-line applications.
The HTTP GET/POST Execution Controller This is a controller that can act as an adapter to run legacy HTTP GET/POST style applications.
The Java Class Execution Controller This controller is built into the main CEA Framework, and allows a java class to be presented as an application.
